```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(shiny)

olympic_overall_medals <- read_csv("data/olympics_overall_medals.csv")

```

Ctrl + P jumps to corresponding bracket pair
Ctrl + i automatically indents the code correctly

```{r}
library(ggplot2)

olympic_overall_medals %>%
  filter(team == "Great Britain",
         season == "Summer") %>%
ggplot(aes(x = medal, y = count, fill = medal)) +
  geom_col()

```
